comments.body: Add a comment here indicating why we close
Why not just use [ioutil.Tempfile](https://golang.org/pkg/io/ioutil/#TempFile) instead of copying it?

TempFile is limited and doesn't allow you to select a suffix.  You want the
suffix to work on Windows.

On Tue, Sep 8, 2015 at 9:28 PM, Jeff Lowdermilk notifications@github.com
wrote:

> > -   }
> > -   return fn()
